text: Tumi ki dekhani ye, allahake sejada kare ya kichu ache nabhomandale, ya kichu ache bhumandale, surya, candra, tarakaraji parbataraji brksalata, jibajantu ebam aneka manusa. Abara anekera upara abadharita hayeche sasti. Allaha yake iccha lanchita karena, take ke'u sam'mana dite pare na. Allaha ya iccha ta'i karena
